section.name: Wizard_Welcome
section.header: Welcome to the MoviePlayer setup wizard
section.body: This wizard will take you through the steps needed to configure MediaPortals Movie-playback. Take your time to read the information on each page carefully for a successful setup.

section.name: Movies
section.information: Configure your Playlists, Subtitles and Font, and On Screen Display preferences.

section.name: MoviePlayer
section.information: If you would like to use other music player than the internal one, select the checkbox, navigate to and select the external music player, and add player-specific parameters.

section.name: MovieExtensions
section.information: You may add, or change the default extensions you want MediaPortal to recognize and play. Please note that additional codecs might be needed.

section.name: MovieShares
section.information: You may setup your specific share requirements, including network shares. Check the default share to view it automtically when entering the movie module.

section.name: Wizard_Finished
section.body: You have now finished the configuration of this Wizard. If at anytime, you wish to alter any of these settings, press F2 from within MediaPortal. Please consult the appropriate MediaPortal documentation for further explanation of each setting.
